name: Dwie Wieze
overview: Dwie Wieże (The Two Towers) is a typical platform game. The main heroine of the game is a sorceress and warrior by the name of Iris. Iris plans to connect to the spirit of fire to give up the human form and learn the secrets of the universe. For this purpose Iris must find a transformation spell. The game consists of four areas: western tower, forest, mine, eastern tower. Iris can collect various items that can be used in a later stage of the game. Contact with the enemy or other deadly obstacle, for example acid, means instant death.
